attributes.action: New Legislation for trans equal rights
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is forced by outdated rules to discriminate trans people. HRT for menopause is obtained with out tests from the GP. If a Trans person needs the same Medicine, they are forced to travel to a separate clinic to be interrogated by psychiatrists. From this, waiting lists are years long. trans women die waiting for the exact same Medicine bald men get from the GP for hair loss. Trans men die waiting for breast reduction that cis women get for back pain. This is medical inequality.
attributes.background: An informed consent system of medical transition and a self-ID system of Legal transition for all who desire it including nonbinary people.

rejection.details:
Decisions about patient care and access to medical treatment are a matter for the NHS and individual clinicians, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions about legal recognition of transgender people, which you might like to sign:

Remove requirement for gender dysphoria diagnosis to obtain a GRC:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590631

Allow trans people over 16 to self-identify:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579904
